specifications.Finish: Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Grin-through Reduction Grin-through reduction helps prevent spandex or inner layers from showing through when the fabric is stretched. It improves color depth and fabric coverage, enhancing the garment’s overall appearance. Durable Chlorine Resistance Durable chlorine resistance allows the fabric to withstand repeated exposure to chlorine without fading or breaking down, making it ideal for swimwear and other water-related uses. 4 Way Stretch A 4-way stretch fabric stretches and recovers both width and lengthwise, allowing it to move naturally with the body and return to its original shape. This provides a comfortable, flexible fit, making it especially suitable for activewear. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. Brand Yarn Creora® Creora® is a spandex with high power and excellent heat resistance, which maintains its fabric power even setting at high temperature or re-dyeing. In particular, this offers outstanding deeper color and better fastness, dyed with disperse dye stuff. Recommended Use Activewear, Swimwear, Leggings
